packages.name: Abacus Time Traveler
packages.description: Track how long a Device has been active. Displays Daily, Weekly, Monthly and Yearly Timers!

packages.name: Abacus Counting Machine
packages.description: Count how many times a Device is triggered. Displays Daily, Weekly, Monthly and Yearly counts!

packages.name: Bundle Manager HPM
packages.description: The place to explore Bundles. Find, install and update bundles quickly and easily.

packages.name: Directional Alerter
packages.description: Get notified on the direction something is moving in. Great for a Driveway Alert with direction.

packages.name: Device Sequencer
packages.description: Turn on/off several devices in a row, with a user defined pause in between each.

packages.name: GCalendar Driver
packages.description: Retrieves a Google Calendar to be used with HE Dashboards.

packages.name: Hub Watchdog
packages.description: Simple way to monitor if your hub is slowing down or not.

packages.name: Life360 with States
packages.description: Connect Life360 to Hubitat including ALL states.

packages.name: One at a Time
packages.description: Designed to allow only one switch, in a group of switches, to be on at a time.

packages.name: Package Explorer
packages.description: Conveniently explore the apps and drivers available within the Hubitat Package Manager.

packages.name: Patterns Plus
packages.description: Create any pattern you want using the zones associated with the Lifx Light Strip.

packages.name: Periodic Expressions
packages.description: Create Periodic Cron Expression to be used with Event Engine.

packages.name: Presence Plus
packages.description: Creates a combined presence device that can be used with Life360 Tracker, Google Assistant, Rule Machine and More!

packages.name: Remote Wellness Check
packages.description: Stay connected to your loved ones. Get notified if they haven't triggered a device in a specified time.

packages.name: Ring Keypad Companion
packages.description: Make the Ring Keypad Gen2 do more! For use with the Ring Alarm Gen 2 Keypad using the Ring Alarm Keypad G2 Community Driver.

packages.name: Ring Alarm Keypad G2 Community Driver
packages.description: Make the Ring Keypad Gen2 do more!

packages.name: Send IP2IR
packages.description: This app is designed to send commands to an iTach IP2IR device.

packages.name: Simple Dates
packages.description: Create a simple coutdown to your most important dates.

packages.name: Simple Device Timer
packages.description: Simple Device Timer with safety checks, reminders, multiple timers and restrictions.

packages.name: Simple Groups
packages.description: Group just about anything. Motion, Contact, Water Sensors and other devices. Even group the groups!

packages.name: Simple Irrigation
packages.description: For use with any valve device connected to your hose, like the Orbit Hose Water Timer. Features mutiple timers and restrictions.

packages.name: Simple Kitchen Timer
packages.description: Create a simple kitchen timer with controls for use with Dashboards

packages.name: Simple Multi Tile
packages.description: Create a simple multi device tile with just a few clicks

packages.name: Snapshot
packages.description: Monitor lights, devices and sensors. Easily see their status right on your dashboard with speech, device and/or push notifications.

packages.name: Tile Master
packages.description: Create a tile with multiple devices with control.
